head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ALEXANDER MENDELSOHNSUZANNE F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ALEXANDER MENDELSOHNSUZANNE F.

block.p: ALEXANDER MENDELSOHNSuzanne F. Of NYC, Fire Island and Boca Raton, FL, beloved wife of Walter Mendelsohn and the late Jules Alexander, cherished daughter of Anita and the late Walter Weinstein, devoted mother of Wendy and Geoffrey (Laura) of Chicago, and loving grandmother of Morgan, died Monday, April 24, 111 days after being diagnosed with cancer. A beautiful, sweet woman who died much too young at 57. A memorial service is planned for early June in NYC.
